arStrings.szText: While {c_important}Blade Shift{/c} is active you gain {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|+%|]{/c} Resistance to All Elements and reduce the duration of incoming Control Impairing Effects by {c_number}[{SF_16}*100|%|]{/c} .
While {c_important}Blade Shift{/c} is active you gain {c_number}[{SF_8}*{SF_15}*100|%+|]{/c} Movement Speed.

Moving through enemies while {c_important}Blade Shift{/c} is active refreshes its duration. After moving through enemies {c_number}{SF_4}{/c} times, your next {c_important}Blade Shift{/c} will {c_important}{u}Daze{/u}{/c} enemies for {c_number}{buffduration:MOD_DAZE}{/c} seconds.
